name: Bomber Barney
overview: Released in the "75 Spill Datatronic" compilation. A variation of Kablam! from the Jan 1985 Compute! Gazette and modified and improved (?) and replushed. Barney, the crazy bomber, is in town. Now he runs back and forth on a platform, releasing bombs on those who may be under him. Instead of arresting him, you must save the day by catching all the bombs with a bucket.
